ayas.text: yusabbiḥu lillāhi mā fis samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍil malikil quddūsil `azīzil ḥakīm
huwal ladhī ba`atha fil-ummiyyīna rasūlan minhum yatlū `alayhim āyātihi wayuzakkīhim wayu`allimuhumul kitāba wal ḥikmata wa in kānū min qablu lafī ḍalālin mubīn
wa-ākharīna minhum lammā yalḥaqū bihim ۚ wahuwal `azīzul ḥakīm
dhālika faḍlullāhi yu-tīhi man yashā-u ۚ wallāhu dhul faḍlil `aẓīm
mathalul ladhīna ḥummilut tawrāta thumma lam yaḥmilūhā kamathalil ḥimāri yaḥmilu asfārā ۚ bi-sa mathalul qawmil ladhīna kadhhabū bi-āyātillāh ۚ wallāhu lā yahdil qawmaẓ ẓālimīn
qul yā-ayyuhal ladhīna hādū in za`amtum annakum awliyā-u lillāhi min dūnin nāsi fatamannawul mawta in kuntum ṣādiqīn
walā yatamannawnahu abadan bimā qaddamat aydīhim ۚ wallāhu `alīmun biẓ ẓālimīn
qul innal mawtal ladhī tafirrūna minhu fa-innahu mulāqīkum ۖ thumma turaddūna ilā `ālimil ghaybi wash shahādati fayunabbi-ukum bimā kuntum ta`malūn
yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanū idhā nūdiya lilṣṣalāti min yawmil jumu`ati fas`aw ilā dhikrillāhi wadharul bay` ۚ dhālikum khayrul lakum in kuntum ta`lamūn
fa-idhā quḍiyatiṣ ṣalātu fantashirū fil-arḍi wabtaghū min faḍlillāhi wadhkurullāha kathīral la`allakum tufliḥūn
wa idhā ra-aw tijāratan aw lahwanin-faḍḍū ilayhā watarakūka qā-imā ۚ qul mā `indallāhi khayrun minallahwi wa minat tijārah ۚ wallāhu khayrur rāziqīn
